description: Create a batch of custom vocabulary items for a given bot locale's custom vocabulary.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot associated with this custom vocabulary.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The identifier of the version of the bot associated with this custom vocabulary.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale where this custom vocabulary is used. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported Languages.

parameters.name: customVocabularyItemList
parameters.description: A list of new custom vocabulary items. Each entry must contain a phrase and can optionally contain a displayAs and/or a weight. (dict) --- The new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list. The unique phrase for the new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list. weight (integer) --- The weight assigned to the new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list. displayAs (string) --- The display as value assigned to the new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_params.name: phrase
nested_params.description: The unique phrase for the new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_params.name: weight
nested_params.description: The weight assigned to the new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_params.name: displayAs
nested_params.description: The display as value assigned to the new custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot associated with this custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The identifier of the version of the bot associated with this custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale where this custom vocabulary is used. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported Languages.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of custom vocabulary items that failed to create during the operation. The reason for the error is contained within each error object.

nested_items.name: itemId
nested_items.description: The unique item identifer for the failed custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message for the failed custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The unique error code for the failed custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: A list of custom vocabulary items that were successfully created during the operation.

nested_items.name: itemId
nested_items.description: The unique item identifer for the custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: phrase
nested_items.description: The unique phrase for the custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: weight
nested_items.description: The weight assigned for the custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.

nested_items.name: displayAs
nested_items.description: The DisplayAs value for the custom vocabulary item from the custom vocabulary list.
